summary: TL* THE CONTACT OWNS A 2004 CHRYSLER PACIFICA. WHILE DRIVING, THE VEHICLE RAN OUT OF FUEL WITHIN THREE MINUTES WITHOUT WARNING. THE VEHICLE WAS TAKEN TO A LOCAL DEALER (SHAVER CHRYSLER DODGE JEEP RAM LOCATED AT 3888 E THOUSAND OAKS BLVD THOUSAND OAKS, CA 91382) WHERE IT WAS DIAGNOSED THAT THE FUEL TANK /PUMP NEEDED TO BE REPLACED. THE VEHICLE WAS NOT REPAIRED. THE MANUFACTURER WAS NOTIFIED OF THE FAILURE, BUT DID NOT OFFER ANY ASSISTANCE. THE FAILURE MILEAGE WAS 100,000.
